profile_summary:
As a Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I focus on developing high-performance backend solutions utilizing **Java**, **Spring**, **Boot**, and **Postgres**. My expertise includes implementing **Test Driven Development** (TDD) strategies to enhance code quality and efficiency. I have substantial experience with **Kubernetes** and **Docker** for orchestration and containerization, ensuring scalable and robust deployment environments.

In addition, I possess a strong foundation in data management with databases like **Astra-DB**, **MongoDB**, and **Cassandra**, which supports my ability to create resilient data architectures. My background in finance equips me with domain knowledge to develop solutions that adhere to industry standards, backed by my proficiency in mathematics and Machine Learning.

My journey in software development has also granted me insights into modern development practices, including microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, allowing me to deliver applications that are secure, compliant, and aligned with best practices.
